item.title: Natural Language : ChatBot Part1 - Twitter API Corpus
item.description: #Target I have summarized a chatbot using the Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit (CNTK). Part 1 prepares you for training your chatbot with the Microsoft Cognitive Toolkit. We will introduce them in the following order. Register Twitter Developer Collecting conversation datasets using Twitter API Pre-processing text data and creating Sentence Piece model Create a file to be read by the built-in reader provided by CNTK #Introduction Assuming you have a Twitter account and Linux is available.
